LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_EnableAcornKnight: Replace Man in Black with Acorn Knight for Lynian factions.
LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_EnableDigSkillRequirement: Lynians must have at least 5 mining skill to use the dig ability.
LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_EnableHairballs: Cat-like Lynians can randomly receive the hairball hediff.
LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_EnableSmellingFelvine: Cat-like Lynians can smell felvine plants for recreation.
LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_EnableCatLikeMasks: Treat all Lynian races as cat-like if wearing specific masks.
LanguageData.Mashed_Lynians_RemoveFacialAnimationComp: Remove [NL] Facial Animation comps from Lynian races on startup.
Enabling this ensures Lynian races use Lynian heads when [NL] Facial Animation is enabled. Disable this if you want cursed Lynians with human heads. Requires a restart for changes to apply.
